page.title: 04Education.
page.content: In its widest sense education must include, not only the state school, but the various religious groups and local societies. 1.ALL SAINTS CHURCH.Sunday School meets school room ,churchyard every Sunday,12 regular members. 2 FIRST SCHOOL.4 Class Primary School of 103 children from Wickhambrook Denston,Lidgate,Stansfield,Stradishall and Ousden,aged 5 to 9 years.AT 9 yrs. transfer to Clare or Newmarket Middle Schools.At 13 yrs. transfer to Upper School at Haverhill or Newmarket. 3 HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY.Exits to promote horticulture with talks,visits and annual summer and autumn shows. 4 METHODIST CHAPEL.Sunday School meets every Sunday.20 regular members.Holds annual Anniversary and Outing.
